nodes.name: Blockable

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Contract is blocked from performing this action"

arguments.value: Contract is blocked from performing this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Contract is blocked from performing this action"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Modifier to ensure the function is only executed when the contract is not blocked.
@dev Reverts with an error if the contract is blocked.
nodes.name: onlyWhenNotBlocked
isBlocked

nodes.documentation: @notice Returns the address of the contract imposing the block.
nodes.name: getBlockedByContract

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the address of the contract allowed to impose a block.
@param _blockedBy The address of the contract that will impose a block.
nodes.name: _setBlockedBy

nodes.documentation: @notice Checks if the contract is currently blocked.
nodes.name: _isBlocked

attributes.name: Blockable

attributes.documentation:
@notice Modifier to ensure the function is only executed when the contract is not blocked.
@dev Reverts with an error if the contract is blocked.
attributes.name: onlyWhenNotBlocked

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Contract is blocked from performing this action"

attributes.type: literal_string "Contract is blocked from performing this action"
attributes.value: Contract is blocked from performing this action

attributes.name: isBlocked

attributes.documentation: @notice Returns the address of the contract imposing the block.
attributes.name: getBlockedByContract

attributes.documentation:
@notice Sets the address of the contract allowed to impose a block.
@param _blockedBy The address of the contract that will impose a block.
attributes.name: _setBlockedBy

attributes.documentation: @notice Checks if the contract is currently blocked.
attributes.name: _isBlocked

devdoc.details: This contract uses an external IBlocker contract to determine if it is blocked. The owner can set the blocking contract.*

isBlocked().details: The function returns false if no blocking contract has been set.
isBlocked().return: Returns true if the contract is blocked, otherwise false.

devdoc.title: Blockable Contract

getBlockedByContract().notice: Returns the address of the contract imposing the block.

isBlocked().notice: Checks if the contract is currently blocked.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows certain actions to be blocked based on the logic of another contract implementing the IBlocker interface.
